plist.dict:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE) CFBundleDisplayName Loginpage CFBundleExecutable $(EXECUTABLE_NAME) CFBundleIdentifier $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName loginpage CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString $(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME) CFBundleSignature ???? CFBundleVersion $(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER) LSRequiresIPhoneOS
UILaunchStoryboardName LaunchScreen UIMainStoryboardFile Main UISupportedInterfaceOrientations
UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight
UISupportedInterfaceOrientations~ipad
UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight
CADisableMinimumFrameDurationOnPhone
UIApplicationSupportsIndirectInputEvents
cd lo
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription We need access to your photo library to let you choose a profile picture and upload shop photos. NSCameraUsageDescription We need access to your camera to let you take a new profile picture or shop photo. NSMicrophoneUsageDescription We need access to your microphone if you choose to record a video for your profile or shop.
